chapters.title: Chapter 46:  Working Leather
chapters.info: Canler, p. 684—One of the Dedicated. He grew up in Andor, and was a farmer before reporting to the Black Tower. He is sturdy, and has gray in his hair. He reports to Logain in the Black Tower. He is older than Emarin2 and Nalaam. His face is square and sun-wrinkled.
